PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EXTERNAL_ORGANIZATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.747213000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_id IN NUMBER
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_external_organization;

body.name: DA_EXTERNAL_ORGANIZATION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EXTERNAL_ORGANIZATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.757509000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_external_organization.add(fx), parms=' || organization_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_external_organization a
(
a.organization_id
,a.organization_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_organization_id.NEXTVAL
,add.organization_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.organization_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_external_organization.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_external_organization.add, parms=' || organization_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_external_organization a
(
a.organization_id
,a.organization_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_organization_id.NEXTVAL
,add.organization_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_external_organization.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_id IN NUMBER
,organization_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_external_organization.add, parms=' || organization_id || '|' || organization_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_external_organization a
(
a.organization_id
,a.organization_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.organization_id
,add.organization_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_external_organization.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,organization_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_external_organization.del, parms=' || organization_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_external_organization a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.organization_id = del.organization_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_external_organization.del');

END del;

END da_external_organization;
